title.rendered: Luxury Golf Getaway Home Features Eldorado Stone

content.rendered:
This dream home featuring Eldorado’s Cypress Ridge profile is found in La Quinta, CA. It beautifully blends Old World charm with modern luxuries to create a warm and inviting retreat for its owners. The home is found right off the signature hole of one of the most beautiful golf courses in the world and for a couple who has a passion for golf, it’s just about as good as it gets.

According to Frank Stolz, principal at South Coast Architects who spearheaded the project, “this design originated with the client’s desire to duplicate the warmth of Tuscan Architecture. The vision we set forth was to create the feel of an old Tuscan Village, but as a private residence within ‘The Hideaway’ golf community.” There was an emphasis on indoor/outdoor living while capturing the spectacular views of the golf course and neighboring mountains.
